message.raw:
Workaround for a bug in NI DAQmx. Added a property to the NI_DAQmx class
to enable the workaround. This flag instructs the wait monitor subprocess
to skip the first rising edge detected (on other devices this edge is not
detected in the first place), and it instructs labscript code to generate an
0.1 second pulse for the wait monitor instead of a shorter pulse. This bug has
been observed on the NI usb 6229 and NI DAQmx 15.0
